query:
DO $$
DECLARE
  test_id uuid := gen_random_uuid();
BEGIN
  INSERT INTO auth.users (
    id, instance_id, aud, role, email, encrypted_password,
    email_confirmed_at, raw_user_meta_data, raw_app_meta_data,
    created_at, updated_at, is_sso_user, is_anonymous
  ) VALUES (
    test_id,
    '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'::uuid,
    'authenticated',
    'authenticated',
    'test-attorney@immigration-ai.dev',
    crypt('TestAttorney123!', gen_salt('bf')),
    now(),
    '{"first_name": "Test", "last_name": "Attorney", "role": "attorney", "bar_number": "TEST-12345"}'::jsonb,
    '{"provider": "email", "providers": ["email"]}'::jsonb,
    now(), now(), false, false
  );
  RAISE NOTICE 'User created: %', test_id;
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'TRIGGER_ERROR: % - %', SQLERRM, SQLSTATE;
END $$;
